Verses: 1 isravel Puththirar Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Purappatta Moondraam Maadham Mudhalaam Naalile, Seenaai Vanaandharaththil Serndhaargal.
2 avargal Revidheemilirundhu Pirayaanam Purappattu, Seenaai Vanaandharaththil Serndhu, Andha Vanaandharaththil Paalayamiranginaargal; Isravelar Ange Malaikku Edhiraagap Paalayamiranginaargal.
3 mose Dhevanidaththirku Eripponaan; Karththar Malaiyilirundhu Avanaik Kooppittu: Nee Yaakkobu Vamsaththaarukkuch Sollavum, Isravel Puththirarukku Arivikkavum Vendiyadhu Ennavendraal,
4 naan Egipthiyarukkuch Seydhadhaiyum, Naan Ungalaik Kazhugugaludaiya Settaigalinmel Sumandhu, Ungalai Ennandaiyile Serththukkondadhaiyum, Neengal Kandirukkireergal.
5 ippozhudhu Neengal En Vaakkai Ullabadi Kettu, En Udanbadikkaiyaik Kaikkolveergalaanaal, Sagala Janangalilum Neengale Enakkuch Sondha Sambaththaayiruppeergal; Boomiyellaam Ennudaiyadhu.
6 neengal Enakku Aasaariya Raajyamum Parisuththa Jaadhiyumaai Iruppeergal Endru Nee Isravel Puththirarode Solla Vendiya Vaarththaigal Endraar.
7 mose Vandhu Janangalin Moopparai Azhaippiththu, Karththar Thanakkuk Karpiththa Vaarththaigalaiyellaam Avargalukku Munbaagach Sonnaan.
8 adharku Janangal Ellaarum Egamaai, Karththar Sonnavaigalaiyellaam Seyvom Endru Piradhiyuththaram Sonnaargal. Janangal Sonna Vaarththaigalai Mose Karththaridaththil Theriviththaan.

9 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Naan Unnode Pesumpodhu Janangal Kettu, Unnai Endraikkum Visuvaasikkumbadi, Naan Kaarmegaththil Unnidaththirku Varuven Endraar. Janangal Sonna Vaarththaigalai Mose Karththarukkuch Sonnaan.
10 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Nee Janangalidaththil Poi, Indraikkum Naalaikkum Avargalaip Parisuththappaduththu; Avargal Thangal Vasthirangalaith Thoiththu,
11 moondraam Naalaikku Aayaththappattirukkakkadavargal; Moondraam Naalil Karththar Sagala Janangalukkum Piraththiyatchamaagach Seenaaimalaiyinmel Iranguvaar.

12 janangalukkuch Sutrilum Nee Oru Ellai Kuriththu, Avargal Malaiyil Eraadhabadikkum, Adhin Adivaaraththaith Thodaadhabadikkum Echcharikkaiyaai Irungal Endru Avargalukkuch Sol; Malaiyaith Thodugiravan Evanum Nichchayamaagave Kollappaduvaan.

13 oru Kaiyum Adhaith Thodalaagaadhu; Thottaal, Nichchayamaagak Kalleriyundu, Alladhu Ooturuva Eyyundu Saagavendum; Mirugamaanaalumsari, Manidhanaanaalumsari, Uyirode Vaikkappadalaagaadhu; Ekkaalam Nedundhoniyaaith Dhonikkaiyil, Avargal Malaiyin Adivaaraththil Varakkadavargal Endraar.
14 mose Malaiyilirundhu Irangi, Janangalidaththil Vandhu, Avargalaip Parisuththappaduththinaan; Avargal Thangal Vasthirangalaith Thoiththaargal.
15 avan Janangalai Nokki: Moondraam Naalukku Aayaththappattirungal, Manaiviyinidaththil Seraadhirungal Endraan.
16 moondraam Naal Vidiyarkaalaththil Idimuzhakkangalum Minnalgalum, Malaiyinmel Kaarmegamum Magaa Balaththa Ekkaalasaththamum Undaayitru; Paalayaththilirundha Janangal Ellaarum Nadunginaargal.
17 appozhudhu Janangal Dhevanukku Edhirkondupoga, Mose Avargalaip Paalayaththilirundhu Purappadappanninaan; Avargal Malaiyin Adivaaraththil Nindraargal.
18 karththar Seenaaimalaiyinmel Akkiniyil Iranginabadiyaal, Adhu Muzhuvadhum Pugaikkaadaai Irundhadhu; Andhap Pugai Soolaiyin Pugaiyaippola Ezhumbitru; Malai Muzhuvadhum Migavum Adhirndhadhu.
19 ekkaalasaththam Varavara Migavum Balamaaith Dhoniththadhu; Mose Pesinaan; Dhevan Avanukku Vaakkinaal Marumozhi Koduththaar.
20 karththar Seenaaimalaiyilulla Kodumudiyil Iranginapodhu, Karththar Moseyai Malaiyin Kodumudiyile Varavazhaiththaar; Mose Eripponaan.

21 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Janangal Paarkkiradharku Ellaiyaik Kadandhu Karththaridaththil Varaadhabadikkum, Avargalil Anegar Azhindhu Pogaadhabadikkum, Nee Irangippoi, Avargalai Urudhiyaaga Echchari.
22 karththarin Samugaththil Varugira Aasaariyargalum, Karththar Thangalukkulle Sangaaram Pannaadhabadi, Thangalaip Parisuththappaduththikkollavendum Endraar.

23 appozhudhu Mose Karththarai Nokki: Malaiyaich Sutrilum Ellai Kuriththu, Adhaip Parisuththappaduththungal Endru Dhevareer Engalai Urudhiyaaga Echchariththirukkireer; Aagaiyaal, Janangal Seenaaimalaiyinmel Erivaramaattaargal Endraan.

24 karththar Moseyai Nokki: Nee Irangippo; Pinbu Neeyum Aaronum Koodi Erivaarungal; Aasaariyargalum Janangalum, Karththar Thangalukkulle Sangaarampannaadhabadikku, Ellaiyaik Kadandhu Karththaridaththil Varaadhirukkakkadavargal Endraar.
25 appadiye Mose Irangi Janangalidaththil Poi, Adhai Avargalukkuch Sonnaan.
